scripts.jscs: jscs benchmarks/*.js lib/*.js lib/**/*.js lib/**/**/*.js test/index.js
scripts.jshint: jscs benchmarks/*.js lib/*.js lib/**/*.js lib/**/**/*.js test/index.js
scripts.lint: npm run jscs && npm run jshint
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
